According to our

Her ourrent daily zate of pay in 814.26. (fourteen dollars and

Wollenare did not suffer a loss of income during the above outlined

en employee of Trans World Airlines Incorporated, Mies Melioners
acerues sick leave allownee at the rate of one and one-sixth

Miss Moliensre

She now bears the risk of a

DJOs edm

properties.sfomuseum:description: Typed correspondence from TWA (Trans World Airlines) superintendent of hostesses Doris J. Owen regarding extended medical leave of stewardess Audrey McNamara due to typhoid fever; letter dated November 8, 1963.
